database.name: VIEW NO_REPORTE_CARGAS_FAMILIARES
database.view: SELECT cbp.c_bpartner_id AS no_reporte_cargas_familiares_id, cbp.c_bpartner_id, cbp.ad_client_id, cbp.ad_org_id, cbp.isactive, cbp.created, cbp.createdby, cbp.updated, cbp.updatedby, ce.nombre, ce.tipo_carga AS tipocargav, ce.genero, date_part('year', age(now(), ce.fecha_nacimiento)) AS edad FROM no_carga_empleado ce, c_bpartner cbp WHERE ce.c_bpartner_id = cbp.c_bpartner_id AND cbp.isemployee = 'Y'
